评论详情: I was scrolling the Amazon clothing section, looking for some unique pants and came across these and showed them to my son- He loved them and decided to wear them as part of his BIRTHDAY outfit.  These looked amazing and didn't fade during washing.

I wear these so often, I'm going to have to get them in more colors! They're corduroy and very comfortable, but the fabric is polyester, so it's not as breathable as cotton. It doesn't really bother me much, but you'll get a little hot in warm weather.  I like loose fitting cargo pants, so I got a medium (I usually wear a small), and they look so good (in my opinion)! I cuff the bottoms with elastics for a silhouette more similar to joggers. They are very stylish and comfortable. I definitely recommend!

These pants bring me back to the late 80s and early 90s. They are quality enough to be comparable with the cordoury pants made in my teen years. Now my teen is enjoying the pants as well. The matching outfit is impossible to find, as the design was created in 2018. I looked everywhere for the purple healed shoes and jacket they show on the pictures, but it's not made anymore. My teen loves them so much, I want a pair. I haven't found very many quality cordoury pants worth raving about until now. Like previous cordoury, it's not too warm, not too thick, not too thin. The material breathes. The size was accurate. Only one pocket (the right front pocket) was sewn into the material in reverse (might be a fluke), but they all function as pockets (not fake decoration).

Perfect

I have been wanting these for a long time and finally decided to order them. I was very excited to receive them and they shipped quickly. Once delivered and I opened them, I was delighted to find that they appeared very high quality upon first impression but my excitement quickly faded upon unfolding them to try them on. I am usually a small and the item description claims to upsize as they “run small”. Bc of this, I ordered a medium. As a professional and business owner, I also do not like my clothes to fit sloppy or messy but tend to prefer a relaxed/comfortable fit. In reality, this “medium” is comparable to an XL or even XXL. I I didn’t even have to try them on to see that these would swallow me. They literally look like clown pants and run HUGE.. I will be returning them and and was planning on ordering an XS but when I went to do so, I saw that they only come in small unless I want the purple/green color way so I’ll pass. Very disappointed. These are comparable to size 34 or 36 jnco jeans in the 90’s. I have a 30-32” waist. This “medium” is definitely NOT a 28” waist as stated in their size guide.. the inside of the pockets also feel VERY cheap although the outside seems to be quality material.. what a disappointment 😔

I just hope that at least the condoms were brand new and not used like the pants were. Respectfully Pauli T. (Without laughter there would only be tears and aggravation)

For reference im a 6'0" 165 lb male who typically fits 30-32 waist size jeans. I bought XXL because the size diagram said this would fit. I am able to tie the waist string very tight and they fit good, but I would have really fit a size L with more comfort. Great quality pants they feel comfy and the inseam length is pretty on par.  Only 2 negatives are I wish I bought a smaller size, and none of the pockets have velcro or snap buttons. I wear them to concerts so would have loved some sort of security for pickpockets, but they are deep pockets where phone or wallet won't fall out.  Overall I would recommend this product even for the price tag, just make sure you get the correct size

评论概述: Obnoxiously too big compared to what size guide listed for numbers & what Amazon “recommended”
评论详情: I am a size 32 waist. The item I was shipped were like clown pants. It could’ve been an interesting look if the drawstrings were more than just decorative. If they were truly functional I could tie the waist tight enough to get by with them, but the pants strings are meant more for show than actually adjusting the fit. Colors are super cool & would love these pants if they fit, but they were just way bigger than described. I can’t begin to estimate what size they actually are, but they were loose on my larger relatives as well, so that’s as much as I need to describe. I know the long length is part of this pants style, intentionally, but it was also a bit excessive & not super functional for wearing these out & about.
